description: Max Scherzer, Jon Lester top the ranking of this year's free-agent class
creator: Keith Law
title: Law: Top 50 MLB free agents

description: The Atlanta Braves and free-agent outfielder Nick Markakis have agreed on a four-year deal, the team announced Wednesday night.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: Markakis, Braves agree to 4-year deal

description: The final bidding on Jon Lester involves more than just the Boston Red Sox, Chicago Cubs and San Francisco Giants, an official of one club in the bidding told ESPN.com on Wednesday.
creator: Jayson Stark
title: Source: Lester bidding includes fourth team

description: The Seattle Mariners have traded outfielder Michael Saunders to the Toronto Blue Jays for left-handed pitcher J.A. Happ.
creator: Jayson Stark
title: Mariners deal Saunders for Jays lefty Happ

description: Right-hander Matt Harvey insists he is "completely on board" with the front office's plan to limit his innings during the regular season so that he can pitch deep into October without reaching an innings cap if the New York Mets remain alive.
creator: Adam Rubin
title: Harvey 'on board' with Mets' innings plan

description: Free-agent reliever Jim Johnson, who racked up 101 saves over the 2012-13 seasons, has signed a one-year deal with the Atlanta Braves.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: Braves sign RP Johnson to one-year deal

description: Major League Baseball and the players' union hope to have a new domestic violence policy in place before next season, MLB executive vice president Joe Torre told a Senate committee hearing Tuesday.
creator: Jayson Stark
title: Torre: MLB near new domestic violence policy

description: Right-hander Luke Hochevar and the Kansas City Royals agreed to a $10 million, two-year deal that should give the defending American League champions even more firepower in their bullpen.
creator: Associated Press
title: Report: Royals' Hochevar gets 2-year deal

description: The Pittsburgh Pirates have signed pitcher Clayton Richard to a minor league contract and invited him to big league camp.
creator: Associated Press
title: Pirates sign P Richard to minor league deal

description: Torii Hunter, the 16-year veteran free-agent outfielder, is returning to his roots with the Minnesota Twins.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: OF Hunter returning to Twins on 1-year deal

description: Veteran Major League Baseball umpire Dale Scott revealed in an interview that he is gay and married to his partner of 28 years.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: Veteran MLB umpire Scott says he's gay

description: The Los Angeles Dodgers acquired outfielder Chris Heisey from the Cincinnati Reds in exchange for right-hander Matt Magill on Tuesday.
creator: Jerry Crasnick
title: Dodgers acquire OF Heisey in trade with Reds

description: Kris Medlen and Brandon Beachy are becoming free agents following decisions by the Atlanta Braves not to offer 2015 contracts to the right-handers, both recovering from their second Tommy John surgeries.
creator: Associated Press
title: Braves' Medlen, Beachy now free agents

description: Nationals center fielder Denard Span had surgery for a sports hernia, and the team expects him to be ready for spring training in February.
creator: Associated Press
title: Nats' Span has surgery for sports hernia

description: San Diego Padres shortstop Everth Cabrera and New York Mets outfielder Eric Young Jr. were among 32 players tossed into the free-agent market Tuesday.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: Padres' Cabrera, Mets' Young among 32 cut

description: New Oakland Athletics third baseman Brett Lawrie has a grassy-knoll theory -- in a roundabout sort of way -- as to why he's missed so many games over the past three seasons with the Toronto Blue Jays.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: A's Lawrie blames artificial turf for absences

description: Australian Open organizers have tweaked the extreme heat policy for 2015 in the wake of complaints from players about dangerous conditions during a heat wave in Melbourne during the last tournament.
creator: Associated Press
title: Australian Open officials tweak heat policy

description: Austrian tennis player Yvonne Meusburger is coming out of retirement to play one more tournament -- the Australian Open in January.
creator: Associated Press
title: Retired Meusburger to return for Aussie Open

description: Serena Williams made a much-awaited appearance at the franchise-based International Premier Tennis League on Sunday but could not lift Singapore Slammers as the team succumbed to a third straight defeat in the first leg.
creator: Associated Press
title: Serena has 'fun' at IPTL event despite losing

description: Andy Murray is to marry long-time girlfriend Kim Sears.
creator: Associated Press
title: Murray engaged to marry longtime girlfriend

description: A French chair umpire on the futures and challenger tours became the first official to be suspended for corruption by the Tennis Integrity Unit when he received a life ban on Tuesday.
creator: Associated Press
title: French tennis federation official banned for life

description: Roger Federer defeated Richard Gasquet 6-4, 6-2, 6-2 in the first reverse singles match Sunday as Switzerland won the Davis Cup final against France by taking an unassailable 3-1 lead.
creator: Associated Press
title: First for Federer as Swiss win Davis Cup

description: Rafael Nadal criticized Spain's female Davis Cup captain on Tuesday for feeding a "false and absurd" debate that started when his coach and uncle questioned whether a woman could coach in the men's game.
creator: Associated Press
title: Nadal criticizes captain for 'false' debate

description: Rafael Nadal says he will return to playing at the start of the year.
creator: Associated Press
title: Nadal says he'll return to action in January

description: Roger Federer has pulled out of the ATP Finals less than one hour before his title match with Novak Djokovic, handing a third consecutive title to the top-ranked Serb.

title: Federer withdraws, cedes ATP title to Djoker

description: Top-ranked Bob and Mike Bryan claimed their fourth doubles title at the ATP Finals with a 6-7 (5), 6-2, 10-7 win over seventh-seeded Ivan Dodig and Marcelo Melo on Sunday.
creator: Associated Press
title: Bryans win their fourth ATP Finals doubles title

description: Serena Williams will hold a run on South Beach next month for runners of all ages and abilities to support her foundation.
creator: Associated Press
title: Serena to host South Beach charitable run

description: The Czech Republic claimed its third Fed Cup title in four years after Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova had to fight hard to overcome Angelique Kerber of Germany in the opening reverse singles match on Sunday.
creator: Associated Press
title: Czechs claim Fed Cup final with German sweep

description: American tennis pro Melanie Oudin is home after a procedure for a heart condition.
creator: Associated Press

description: Fourth-ranked Simona Halep has parted ways with coach Wim Fissette after less than a year.

description: Roger Federer, Andy Murray and the Bryan brothers are among the winners of the ATP World Tour Awards.
creator: Associated Press

description: For the bulk of Tiger Woods' career, pro-am rounds have been more about obligation than preparation, a necessary part of a high-profile tour player's life on the eve of another tournament.

description: We're following Tiger Woods during his pro-am round at the Hero World Challenge.

description: With the anchored putting stroke becoming illegal in January 2016, Keegan Bradley is transitioning now to a shorter putter.

description: Fresh off her $1.5 million payoff at the CME Group Tour Championship, Lydia Ko received even better news. She has been accepted into the Korea University, one of the top colleges in Seoul.

description: Tiger Woods went back to his very successful past to try to forge a path to the future.

description: Golfing great Jack Nicklaus will receive Congress' highest civilian honor, the Congressional Gold Medal.

description: Phil Mickelson will make his 2015 season debut next month at the Humana Challenge in La Quinta, Calif.

description: As the European Tour embarks on its 2015 season this week at the Nedbank Golf Challenge in South Africa, it will do so with a new points structure for its season-long Race To Dubai series.

description: Robin Burke has been selected as U.S. captain for the Curtis Cup in 2016.

description: Jordan Spieth made his first trip Down Under a successful one and shot an 8-under 63 on Sunday to win the Australian Open by 6 strokes.

description: The European Tour announced Tuesday that Brooks Koepka won the Sir Henry Cotton award as Europe's top rookie.

description: Henrik Stenson birdied the last two holes Sunday to successfully defend his DP World Tour Championship title at the European Tour's season-ending event.

description: Stacy Lewis is the first American in 21 years to sweep the three biggest awards on the LPGA Tour.

description: Heavyweight contender Tyson Fury laid a one-sided beating on British countryman Dereck Chisora in a world title eliminator before Chisora's trainer, Don Charles, threw in the towel after the 10th round on Saturday night at the ExCel Arena in London.

description: Terence Crawford showcased the speed, length and pinpoint accuracy that have made him a compelling star on the rise with a unanimous decision over respected challenger Ray Beltran.

description: Hollywood actor Mickey Rourke returned to the boxing ring Friday at the age of 62, defeating a fighter less than half his age in an exhibition bout.

description: British lightweight contender Kevin Mitchell and blue-chip heavyweight prospect Anthony Joshua, Great Britain's 2012 Olympic super heavyweight gold medalist, will appear on the same card on Jan. 31 at the O2 Arena in London.
creator: Dan Rafael

description: Cruiserweight titlist Yoan Pablo Hernandez suffered a right elbow injury and has withdrawn from his mandatory defense against Ola Afolabi.
creator: Dan Rafael

description: Manny Pacquiao scored six knockdowns and dominated virtually every minute of the fight to win a lopsided unanimous decision against Chris Algieri.

description:
Featherweight titlist Vasyl Lomachenko, the brilliant two-time Ukranian Olympic gold medalist regarded by many as the best amateur fighter in boxing history, is making quite a name for himself as a professional.

Lomachenko, who won a world title in only his third professional fight, made his first defense against Chonlatarn Piriyapinyo and cruised to a one-sided, unanimous decision on Saturday night at the Venetian Macao's Cotai Arena in Macau, China, (Sunday morning Macau time) on the Manny Pacquiao-Chris...
creator: Dan Rafael
title: Lomachenko hurts hand, still tops Piriyapinyo

description: Muhammad Ali's daughters are in London to promote the U.K. release of the documentary "I Am Ali." They say the former boxing champion is still waiting to see it for the first time.

description: Why the winger can make a big impact; plus, teams that should trade for him

description: Ilya Bryzgalov has agreed to join the Anaheim Ducks on a similar kind of tryout as the one Martin Brodeur had last week with the St. Louis Blues, a situation that likely will lead the colorful goalie to a contract with Anaheim, sources have told ESPN.com.
